SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code WHERE l.type = 'COUNTRY' AND ld.language = #{language}
AND l.code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and ld.country LIKE concat('%', concat(#{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and l.code IN ( #{includeList} )
ORDER BY country

SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, '' as state FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code WHERE l.type = 'COUNTRY' AND l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND ld.language = #{language} UNION SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, va.alias as state FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code LEFT JOIN sys_vendor_alias va ON l.code = va.code WHERE l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND l.type IN ('STATE', 'CITY/STATE') AND va.vendor_type = #{vendorType} AND ld.language = #{language} AND va.language = #{language}
and l.code IN (#{includeList})

SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, va.alias as state, '' as city FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code LEFT JOIN sys_vendor_alias va ON l.code = va.code WHERE l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.code, 4, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 4, 3) AND l.type IN ('STATE', 'CITY/STATE') AND va.vendor_type = #{vendorType} AND ld.language = #{language} AND va.language = #{language} UNION SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, ld.state as state, va.alias as city FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code LEFT JOIN sys_vendor_alias va ON l.code = va.code WHERE l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.code, 4, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 4, 3) AND l.type = 'CITY' AND va.vendor_type = #{vendorType} AND ld.language = #{language} AND va.language = #{language}
and l.code IN (#{includeList})

SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, ld.state as state, va.alias as city, '' as district FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code LEFT JOIN sys_vendor_alias va ON l.code = va.code WHERE l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.code, 4, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 4, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.code, 7, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 7, 3) AND l.type = 'CITY' AND va.vendor_type = #{vendorType} AND ld.language = #{language} AND va.language = #{language} UNION SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country, ld.state as state, ld.city as city, va.alias as district FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code LEFT JOIN sys_vendor_alias va ON l.code = va.code WHERE l.country_code = SUBSTR( #{code}, 1, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.`code`, 4, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 4, 3) AND SUBSTR(l.`code`, 7, 3) = SUBSTR( #{code}, 7, 3) AND va.vendor_type = #{vendorType} AND l.type = 'REGION' AND ld.language = #{language} AND va.language = #{language}
and l.code IN (#{includeList})

SELECT l.code as code, l.type as type, ld.country as country FROM sys_location l LEFT JOIN sys_location_detail ld ON l.code = ld.code WHERE l.type = 'COUNTRY' AND ld.language = #{language} AND l.code LIKE concat('%', concat(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
